component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Added Rule model and rule import routine
Added Rule model and rule import routine
Bugfix: MODE-order not consistent Bugfix: allow (,) in example sentences
Some length fixes for get_comma_list etc.
Add umlauts and ! to lexer wordchars
- Added real sentences - Some minor UI tweaks - Activate random choosing of task types
- CSS tweaks - Disabled XFrameOptions middleware (we want to embed!) - added allowed sites to settings
- new concept: activated rules - user progress method to activate new rules - welcome message - introduction of new rules after level raise
- basic auth login (username = password) - new task type: correct commas - new task type: explain commas - reset action
- "Regeln im Fokus" statt Liste - Regel-Paragraf als Titel - Kommas linksbündig
- Fragebogen zum Einsiteg - Umstellung auf Bootstrap
